work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed and implemented a backend application in spring for a chatbot that helps users navigate through various business processes.

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description:
Integrated Wise API (formerly TransferWise) as a payout gateway supporting transfer of GBP (primary) to multiple currencies.
Developed a dashboard in vue.js showcasing various statistics to the admin using graphs and charts to see quick and easy visualizations of data.
Created a dictionary web application in laravel consisting of 1500 words across 50 categories in a tabular representation in a navigational hierarchy.
Collaborated with other developers to identify and fix bugs to ensure that the application meets customer requirements.
